---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
project <- read_csv("data/project_management.csv")
```

# 1.

```{r}
project %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimated_length, y = actual_length))+
  geom_point()
```
# 2. 

```{r}
project %>% 
  summarise(r = cor(estimated_length, actual_length))
```

It is a very strong correlation. 

# 3. 

```{r}
model <- lm(formula = estimated_length ~ actual_length,
   data = project)
```

# 4.

```{r}
summary(model)
```
```{r}
library(broom)
```
```{r}
glance_output <- clean_names(glance(model))
```

```{r}
glance_output$r_squared
```



# 5. 

```{r}
library(ggfortify)
library(modelr)
```

```{r}
autoplot(model)
```
